overview:
SoRewarding.com is your social marketplace for creating offers in your community while supporting the causes you love!

SoRewarding is a social network for local businesses, consumers, non-profits, and organizations. With our brand new Consumer Driven Deals platform, consumers can now send deal requests to local merchants, who can accept, reject, or counter-offer with the click of a button. For every money-saving offer purchased, SoRewarding donates 5% of the offer price to a local non-profit.

SoRewarding is a win for everyone. Consumers create the deals they want, when they want. Merchants reach new customers, under the terms they want, and have a way to further engage their customers. Non-profits have a steady revenue stream that requires only one person to manage. Organizations have a centralized location for communication and event planning. SoRewarding creates an online eco-system that facilitates exchange, enhances communication, fosters growth, and unifies your community.
